GSD.description:
ext4: fix warning in ext4_iomap_begin as race between bmap and write

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit fa6482f374fda29a71ad44d76d35b4842d43cda4. For more details please see the references link.
